i18n.key: Website's main URL, including the protocol (″http://″), but without the final ″/″.
drop a skin here to apply it to the element
select a sylesheet to apply it to the element

Set to 'yes' to use URLs like 'http://www.example.com/fr/' and 'http://www.example.com/de/'. Set to 'no' to use a different domain name for each localised version, like 'http://www.example.fr' and 'http://www.example.de'.
Domain name of the website (e.g.: www.rbs.fr)
append website's name to the title of the pages
select ″yes″ to always append the website's name to the page titles (recommended by accessibility guidelines)
Text contents of the robot.txt file
ID contained in the Google identification file name (/google<ID>.html)
the text contained in the Google identification file (/google<ID>.html)
ID in the Yahoo identification file name (/y_key_<ID>.html)
text contents of the Yahoo identification file (/y_key_<ID>.html)
XML contents of the Bing identification file (/BingSiteAuth.xml)
List of the page templates authorised on this site
Script used to initialise the website structure.
Template to apply to the content pages.
Template to apply to the homepage. Leave blank to use the same template as the content pages.
